Hydras/Perceptor/BlackStorm:::

"Tripedocus want play with us, my dear"hissed Hidras "And I'm willing 
to play with them"

BlackStorm took a weapon and  left the base, looking for a target. 
Perceptor did the same

As soon as, BlackStorm left the base, Hydras took a weapon and said 
cooly to Maximna "Do you remember your commands about BlackStorm, my 
dear?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> Maxima's optics glanced up at the alarm lights. "Blast!" just as 
the clone 
> finished. 
> 
> She turned around to face the clone. Motioning the clone forward. 
As it 
> stepped forward she motioned to another area. "There. Stay in the 
chamber until I 
> return." 
> 
> The clone obeyed & hid in the chamber as Maxima raced out of the 
room. 
> Charging down the corridor, she glanced into the command room. 
Hydras was gone. 
> "Bloody hell," somehow she didn't like this. 
> 
> As she ran back down the corridor, she punched a panel as a weapons 
cache 
> showed itself. Grabbing 2 major damage weapons. Then took off. 
> 
> Racing down to the exit where she saw Perceptor & the tail end of 
Blackstorm. 
> Whipping out. "Perceptor! Report!" was all she knew. Wanting to 
know what was 
> going on.
